definition: awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

sentences.english: She recently falls in love for Orange juice and Mango Juice….
sentences.chinese: 最近她爱上了两种果汁，橙汁和芒果汁。

sentences.english: Sorry, we only have canned mango juice.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我们只有罐装的芒果汁。

sentences.english: I am sorry. I only have mango juice and lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，我只能喝芒果汁和柠檬水。

sentences.english: Instead, they stuck it out and subsisted on mango juice.
sentences.chinese: 最终，她们决定还是呆在车上，靠芒果汁补充体力。

sentences.english: Sour unripe mango, biting lime, salty fish sauce and crisped catfish.
sentences.chinese: 芒果汁，青柠檬，加盐的鱼汁陪油炸猫鱼。

sentences.english: Strawberry, but this time, mango juice.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我们只有罐装的芒果汁。

sentences.english: First, mango juice is added to the ice then fresh mango.
sentences.chinese: 首先把芒果汁儿倒在冰上，再加入新鲜芒果片。

sentences.english: Add sago into mango juice and diced mango.
sentences.chinese: 西米加入芒果汁和芒果粒。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
nata de coco (a chewy jelly made from fermented coconut water)
